section.p: After a time of aimless drifting, you come out on to the open sea. One day, you spot a bottle bobbing in the waves. You pluck it from the waters, and pop the cork.
To your amazement, a great stream of scarlet smoke roars out of the bottle. The smoke condenses into a huge, fat-bellied genie, wearing a loincloth, and a bejewelled turban. His skin is bright red.
The genie speaks in a rumbling baritone, ‘Ah, free at last! Thank you, small one, for freeing me. Now, as is customary in these affairs, I will grant you a wish as a reward. What do you desire?’

choices.choice: Ask to be teleported to Yarimura
Ask for a king’s ransom in gold Shards
Ask for knowledge of a skill of your choice
